quote: Each time we don't say what we wanna say, we're dying. – Yoko Ono
fact: The average talker sprays about 300 microscopic saliva droplets per minute, about 2.5 droplets per word.
joke: Doctor you've got to help me, I'm addicted to Twitter. Doctor: I don't follow you.
